item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

usually people would use capital letters for the start of new words. try “ClanSystem”. go to the file, check the name.

item.title: Possibly a small error, but can someone please help me understand how to fix it
item.dc:creator: @bever601 bever601
item.description:
@bever601 wrote:

I’m using Delta but never mind I fixed the problem, and the problem was- It didn’t have the other half of the clan source thingy lol and the only way was to either get all of it then import it with game handler or delete the whole line and thats what I did because i had to hurry and fix like 5 things but thats like 5/5000 things I have to fix lol but are you good or pretty good at programming?

item.title: Possibly a small error, but can someone please help me understand how to fix it
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“bever601, post:1, topic:449628”]client.java:12: error: package Clansystem does not exist
import Clansystem.Clanroomcheck;
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

What do I do? I try adding things… when I compile It says this and after I run the source, and run my client, and nothing gets added please need some help and here is what my compiler looks like when you right click and edit. I just started programming, I know I guess I have to import the Clansystem.Clanromcheck; like it says but im not understand where it is, or how to do it lol. Im new at programming but it seems fun trying to learn
Is my compiler edit right as well?

@echo off
@title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe” *.Java
pause
exit[/quote]
What base are you using?

Read full topic
